text: (nabiyē!) dharmaya himi aya (taman kæmati vana andamaṭa) ahasin taman veta ek dharmayak pahaḷa karana men obagen vimasannāha. niyata vaśayenma mīṭat vaḍā loku dæyak mūsā vetin ovun illā “allāhva apaṭa pratyakṣava penvanu” yayi pævasūha. ebævin ovungē aparādhayē hētuven ovunva heṇa haṅa allā gattēya. (mepamaṇakda?) ovun veta pæhædili (vividha) sādhakayan pæmiṇi pasuda, vasu pæṭavaku (deviyeku bavaṭa) pat kara gatha. meyada api kṣamā kara, (ovungē nabi) mūsāṭa (in pasuvada) pæhædili sādhakayak labā dunnemu
